name: Remedy Ruckus
description:
Click and Drag backwards to aim
Release to fire the projectile

Poison Kills Rats
Cures cure Sickos (sick people)
Bombs destroy obstacles

Remedy Ruckus is a game where you have to toss bombs, cures and poison to it's correct "owner".  Save the sick people, destroy the walls and exterminate the rats in order to save the town.

Remedy Ruckus is a game I started almost a year ago, almost immediately after "Catch the Cure" was made. It is a game that has encountered several pivots, and has gone in and out of development since day one. I worked on it a couple of weeks, then put it down for a few months, rinse and repeat.

So I decided to finally finish the crucial parts and then release it! so here you go, Remedy Ruckus, and it's first ten levels!

Post Mortem: http://www.victorweidar.com/2017/11/13/remedy-ruckus-post-mortem/

Enjoy!
